body.name: Elite Gourmet EHC9420 Automatic Brew & Drip Coffee Maker with Pause N Serve Reusable Filter, On/Off Switch, Water Level Indicator, Stainless Steel
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SEMI-TRANSPARENT WATER RESERVOIR holds up to 5 cups of water capacity with a level indicator to always ensure you have enough water ready for brewing.
5 CUP GLASS CARAFE for brewing the perfect quantity of hot fresh coffee for an individual or a small group of people.
PAUSE 'N SERVE allows a quick sneak of fresh coffee in the middle of brewing of you're running low on time or just need a quick coffee fix.
RE-USABLE FILTER in a swing-out basket is better for the environment and reduces additional cost of paper cone filters.
SIMPLE ON/OFF SWITCH with a Power Indicator Light, plus no special programming or settings to complicate the coffee maker function.
body.description: Start your day off right with the Elite Gourmet 5-Cup Coffeemaker. With its compact and sleek design that takes up limited counter space and fits into any nook. It is perfect for small spaces such as office kitchens, dorm rooms or recreatiol vehicles. Quickly and effortlessly brew your favorite coffee to jump start your day. No need to stop at a local coffee house to buy a cup of joe just to make it through the day. You can also use your own coffee grounds in the included reusable filter. Simply add fresh water for each brew. Cleanup is a cinch, all removable parts and accessories are dishwasher safe. Enjoy a cup of joe on the go with the Elite Gourmet 4-Cup Coffeemaker

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't talk to me before my coffee.....
reviews.reviewText: This little machine is wonderful! It makes great coffee, it's easy to clean, and it's very easy to use. It doesn't take long to work, either, which is useful when you REALLY need your coffee!!! LOVE THIS!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooo glad I bought this!!!
reviews.reviewText: There are many coffee makers to choose from but this one stood out because I like the black and chrome together. But the most important thing is the taste of the coffee and this little coffee maker does a perfect job of that!!! I wish I had bought it years ago!!! It’s super cute and easy to clean. I couldn’t be happier!UPDATE: I still like my little coffee maker BUT I have noticed I have to be careful with the amount of grounds I add or else it clogs …..and I have noticed sometimes it does not stop dripping coffee if I pull the carafe away to pour my coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: I am the only person who drinks coffee in my home, so this little pot is the perfect size for me. The only problem is that is does leak alot while pouring coffee into my cup. I have to put the cup over the sink when pouring my coffee or else I will have a mess on my counter. If they would mix this problem, I would give this pot 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's just right for me
reviews.reviewText: What perfect packing! And 2 day delivery.A perfectly priced pretty little black and chrome 5 cup coffee maker. It was easy to unpack & set up.It comes with it's own filter basket that leaves very little residue in the pot!If you're switching from K-cups, BTW, like I did when my brewer died on me, 1 1/2 K-cups makes a perfect pot in this maker. or just 1 for a little over a 1/2 pot. What, you thought I'd throw those away? No way.And it does have pause function but you DO have to remember to turn it off yourself.Oh my ... did I do that?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I live alone and got tired of my 12-cup pot taking up so much counter space and thought I'd try this. I love it. It takes up very little room. It brews up to five cups, if needed, and is quick. The only drawback is no auto shutoff feature, so you have to be vigilant so as to not cause the carafe to break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Coffee pot got slower to make coffee after 1 year
reviews.reviewText: Have had the Elite Gourmet Coffee pot for slightly over 1 year. Overall it’s been a pretty decent coffee pot. The main complaints I have after one year of use, as others have noted: 1) it drips a lot when you pull coffee pot off the base to poor coffee while it is still making. I bought this coffee pot specifically for the pause & serve feature, but unfortunately many times it does not pause as suggested, it still drips coffee quite a bit, which is frustrating. 2) And lately, the most frustrating thing is that the coffee making process has become extremely slower to make a pot of coffee! The past month or so it takes around 20 to 25 minutes start to finish to make a pot of coffee, which seems extremely slow and much longer than it should take! Also I have noticed after initially turning on the coffee pot to start making coffee, the water/coffee will trickle barely into the pot, then it will stop for a minute as if the coffee pot has to think about making the coffee. Then it will start trickling the coffee again, then it will stop & start off and on for the next 25 minutes. Almost as if the filter where the water/coffee drips into the pot is clogged, not sure. I just called elite gourmet support and they had not heard of this issue, but buyer beware, the coffee pot seems to get gradually slower and also drips too much with use/time. Otherwise it makes good coffee and I have no complaints about the quality of the coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great price, beautiful modern look, works great! I bought it twice for family relatives

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice coffee maker, but know that...
reviews.reviewText: Coffee tastes very good. For the price it is great. Have been using it a few weeks now, and so far, using the "sneak a cup" feature does not cause the coffee to drip on the heat plate. It is very difficult to find a smaller size coffee maker.I kept my old, name brand maker way too long, for about 2 years, it really leaked and cost more than twice this new one. I purchased and returned the newer model of my current maker. I never cut the plastic off of it. I read through the user manual and there were so many do's and don'ts, it gave me a headache.Way too complicated. This new maker is coffee, water, turn on.When I looked at the beat up, old pot, and this new pot, I decided that for the price, I could afford to get a new one every year (if necessary.)Note these cons:Automatic turn off does not work.Lid is attached to the pot, making pot harder to clean.The pot leaking..not exactly a leak. The lid is NOT designed to fit the pot. Pour REALLY slow, to avoid drip.These are not deal breakers for me. I would buy this coffee maker again.
Bonita y util. Toma poco espacio

reviews.reviewTitle: Exceeded my expectations - quick hot coffee
reviews.reviewText: Size: 5 cup Color- blackI bought because my big coffee maker died & I needed a same day replacement. I chose this lesser known brand (at least to me) based on the great reviews,. It did not disappoint! It's a small but solid coffee maker. the carafe fits snuggly and the pause to pour works well - no drippy mess. It comes with a reusable basket which is great because it's much smaller than the standard filters. It keeps the coffee really hot for 2 hours. 5 cups is exactly enough for 2 14 oz mugs, Highly recommend.

This coffee maker fits perfectly on my small countertop, make excellent coffee and since I only drink 2 cups a day, it makes the perfect amount of coffee for me. Great little machine. Simple to use too!

reviews.reviewTitle: 2-cups. It works. Good value. But with some caveats...
reviews.reviewText: This is a reasonable value. I've seen them for less, but everything is inflated in price right now.First things first, this is a 2-cup coffee maker, not 5. We're not measuring for baking ingredients precision here, we're measuring for the coffee cups that we all drink out of.One standout, is that the keep-warm plate/surface is just the right temperature. I've had coffee machines that had a warming plate that was too hot, and it would either burn the coffee or just evaporate everything within a couple hours.There are a couple annoyances with this.When you open the lid, there's condensation underneath, and if you open at a 90degree angle, it slides down and follows along the _outside_ at the back of the machine, getting onto the table or whatever surface it's standing on.It's not hard, but slightly tricky to pour the water in, with the flap up, as there's not much margin for error in there.When you first pour, the hot steam pushes out the back, onto you place your thumb to hold it the caraffe. This is a design flaw. There's not enough to cause any serious burns, but it does give a burning sensation. It's steam after all.I don't use this to actually make coffee in the filter. That grows a certain type of bacteria in the plastic of the basket, which gives the coffee from all machines an acrid taste after a year, and no amount of washing can get rid of it.I just use it to boil water, and keep it hot. I make either instant coffee or tea with it. It's an inexpensive alternative to those very expensive tea kettles that keep your water warm.
C'est très joli et fonctionne très bien. Par contre n'est pas automatique.
